# PED::SET_PED_TO_LOAD_COVER

## Summary
Makes sure cover is loaded around them before a set action. More info.. (Warning)  More info.

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** force

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Please use this sparingly and remember to reset it after use.
